dcterms:creator: F. Maxwell Harper
Joseph A. Konstan
dcterms:description: The ML1M-2 dataset consists of movie ratings categorized into two genres: Sci-Fi and Horror. It is used to analyze the performance disparity in recommendation systems based on item group attributes.
dcterms:title: ML1M-2

dcterms:creator: F. Maxwell Harper
Joseph A. Konstan
dcterms:description: The ML1M-4 dataset consists of movie ratings categorized into four genres: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Children, and Horror. It is used to evaluate recommendation systems with multiple item attributes.
dcterms:title: ML1M-4

dcterms:creator: Julian McAuley
Christopher Targett
Qinfeng Shi
Anton Van Den Hengel
dcterms:description: The Amazon-2 dataset consists of product reviews from Amazon, categorized into two types: Grocery and Tool. It is used to analyze recommendation systems based on item group attributes.
dcterms:title: Amazon-2

dcterms:creator: Julian McAuley
Christopher Targett
Qinfeng Shi
Anton Van Den Hengel
dcterms:description: The Amazon-4 dataset consists of product reviews from Amazon, categorized into four types: Grocery, Office, Pet, and Tool. It is used to evaluate recommendation systems with multiple item attributes.
dcterms:title: Amazon-4
